description.narrative: The overall objective of the programme is to contribute to the GoB¿s efforts to overcome structural problems in the public administration in order to reduce poverty, through institutional reforms and the formulation of public sector policies. This will be achieved through support to complementary interventions at central and decentralized levels of public administration, aiming at creating an inclusive, transparent and efficient public sector, thereby improving the national framework for the implementation of the National Development Plan as well as the sector programmes of the Danish country programme. The following immediate objectives, corresponding to the four subcomponents, will contribute to the achievement of the overall objective. 1. Modernisation of the public sector at the central level. a) Creation of a New Public Administration that is inclusive, transparent, ethical, equitable and highly productive. b) Strengthening of the institutional capacities of the mandated entities for prevention, investigation and sanction of corruption, in order to effectively fight corruption. 2. Modernisation of the public sector at the decentralized levels ¿ Programme for Rural Participative Investment (PRPI). a) The institutional capacities of the national, departmental and municipal governments, their associations and civil society have been strengthened in order to undertake coordinated and consensual management. b) Investments have been carried out in productive infrastructure and services that benefit the local population and economic actors in the project area.
